name: wc-grid-table
description: A table component implemented with css-grid and webcomponents.

scripts.copy_public: cp src/public/* dist && cp src/example1/* dist/example1 && cp src/standalone/* dist/standalone && cp src/styles/* dist/styles
scripts.build_standalone_min: browserify -p tinyify -t browserify-css src/wc-grid-table.js --standalone WcGridTable > dist/standalone/bundle.min.js
scripts.build_all: npm run build && npm run build_min && npm run build_standalone && npm run build_standalone_min && npm run build_exmpl1 && npm run build_exmpl1_min && npm run copy_public
scripts.publish_all: npm run build_all && git add * && git commit && git push && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Robert Seidler
